conditions.rails: The away bend is operating as a shared bend for this meeting, with the Chases being run 16yds out from the offical line and the hurdle races being run 8yds less than the official line.  The usual shared A1 bend is positioned 19yds out from the official line. Distances affected as per the summary.
conditions.weatherComment: 1.5mm rain on Monday in showers and blustery winds. Cooler and sunny on Tuesday and a light breeze. Dry & cool on Wednesday with virtually no breeze. Dry and overcast, no breeze on Thursday. Friday was clam, dry and overcast all day. 0.5mm rain overnight into Saturday. Forecast is for another overcast day, with a light breeze, temps of 10C.
conditions.other: Head Groundsman; Ian Ward - 07880 722586

conditions.weatherComment:
An overcast day Monday with trace of rain. Overnight frost out of ground and track raceable. Latest measurable rainfall; 2mms on Tuesday 15th January.

Monday afternoon -  overcast with temperatures rising to +4 by 5pm.
Monday night - Temperatures to remain above freezing on Monday night with a low of +1 and 80% chance of rain for a couple of hours before midnight as a front of rain/sleet/wet snow passes through region 
Tuesday - temperatures to dip briefly to 0 degrees with the daylight. Temperatures then rise to +2 degrees by noon leaving a dry day with sunny intervals,2 degrees

data.otherText: Frost covers are in place to protect vulnerable areas. For Going updates please call Clerk of the Course Anthea Morshead on 07837 559861 or follow Twitter @AntheaMorshead, or call Head Groundsman Brian Meikle on 07774 172527

data.going: ABANDONED - Frozen (Day of Racing) (GoingStick:6.8 on 22-01-2019 at 14:35) Hurdle: 6.7 - Chase: 6.8
data.weather: 4mm rain on Friday night / Saturday AM. Dry and overcast during Saturday, with temps at +3C. Dry & overcast on Sunday and Monday. 3mm rain overnight into Tuesday. Bright and sunny morning, but overcast PM. Further 1mm sleety rain on Tuesday evening, followed by a clear night with a low of -4.5C. Wednesday is forecast to be bright and clear and +2C, followed by another cold and clear night on Wednesday into Thursday, with up to -3C forecast again.
data.other: Head Groundsman: Ian Ward (07880 722586)

data.going: ABANDONED - Frozen (Day of Racing) Race meeting abandoned. Frozen ground
data.weather: Showers. Race meeting abandoned at 6.15 am on Thursday 24th Jan. Wed night gave min temp of -6.5, current temp -2 and max temp for day +3 at about 1 pm. Furthermore, possible light rain/sleet in next couple of hours which likely to make matters worse as falling onto frozen ground. Sorry to be the bearer of sad news. If you have any questions please give me a buzz on 07767 802206. David

conditions.weatherComment:
Friday mild after 2.5mm rain early morning
Passing shower overnight.
Saturday late afternoon 1.5mm  followed by a further 1.5mm early Sunday morning.
Chance of some light wintry showers Saturday afternoon with rain likely late Saturday night/early Sunday
Wind switches to North Westerly overnight and strengthens so Sunday a chilly and blustery day with some wintry showers on and off.
conditions.other: Should any Travelers/Companions not have run in the previous four days or be entered to run in the next four days they will be charged for £20 + VAT
